LanguageData.VFEArch_Asphalt.label: асфальт
LanguageData.VFEArch_Asphalt.description: Industrial-style asphalt used to create roads and streets. Very easy to traverse for people and vehicles alike.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquet.label: дерев'яний паркет
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquet.description: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquetWalnut.label: горіховий паркет
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquetWalnut.description: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquetBirch.label: березовий паркет
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquetBirch.description: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquetMahogany.label: паркет з червоного дерева
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodenParquetMahogany.descriptio: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling. Whilst beautiful, it takes a long time to lay down and is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodPlankFloorWalnut.label: чоріхова підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodPlankFloorWalnut.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodPlankFloorBirch.label: березова підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodPlankFloorBirch.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodPlankFloorMahogany.label: підлога з червоного дерева
LanguageData.VFEArch_WoodPlankFloorMahogany.descripti: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorSandstone.label: підлога з пісковика
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorSandstone.descri: Random-size stone tiles for a rustical, castle feeling. Take less time to construct than ordinary stone tiles and don’t require stone cutting expertise, but lack the beauty of the polished design.
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorGranite.label: гранітна підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorGranite.descript: Random-size stone tiles for a rustical, castle feeling. Take less time to construct than ordinary stone tiles and don’t require stone cutting expertise, but lack the beauty of the polished design.
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorLimestone.label: вапнякова підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorLimestone.descri: Random-size stone tiles for a rustical, castle feeling. Take less time to construct than ordinary stone tiles and don’t require stone cutting expertise, but lack the beauty of the polished design.
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorSlate.label: сланцева підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorSlate.descriptio: Random-size stone tiles for a rustical, castle feeling. Take less time to construct than ordinary stone tiles and don’t require stone cutting expertise, but lack the beauty of the polished design.
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorMarble.label: мармурова підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_CobblestoneFloorMarble.descripti: Random-size stone tiles for a rustical, castle feeling. Take less time to construct than ordinary stone tiles and don’t require stone cutting expertise, but lack the beauty of the polished design.
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorSandstone.desc: Fancy, polished stone tiles for an elegant, mansion-like look. Don’t take nearly as long to lay down as the finer stone floors, but require a lot of resources. They are incredibly beautiful to look at.
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorGranite.label: підлога з полірованого граніта
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorGranite.descri: Fancy, polished stone tiles for an elegant, mansion-like look. Don’t take nearly as long to lay down as the finer stone floors, but require a lot of resources. They are incredibly beautiful to look at.
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorLimestone.desc: Fancy, polished stone tiles for an elegant, mansion-like look. Don’t take nearly as long to lay down as the finer stone floors, but require a lot of resources. They are incredibly beautiful to look at.
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorSlate.label: підлога з полірованого сланцю
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorSlate.descript: Fancy, polished stone tiles for an elegant, mansion-like look. Don’t take nearly as long to lay down as the finer stone floors, but require a lot of resources. They are incredibly beautiful to look at.
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorMarble.label: підлога з полірованого мармуру
LanguageData.VFEArch_PolishedStoneFloorMarble.descrip: Fancy, polished stone tiles for an elegant, mansion-like look. Don’t take nearly as long to lay down as the finer stone floors, but require a lot of resources. They are incredibly beautiful to look at.
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsSandstone.label: плита з пісковика
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsSandstone.description: Large slabs of stone laid at random for that temple-like look. Beautiful to look at, they take a lot of work to place down and use up large amounts of resources.
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsGranite.label: гранітна плита
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsGranite.description: Large slabs of stone laid at random for that temple-like look. Beautiful to look at, they take a lot of work to place down and use up large amounts of resources.
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsLimestone.label: вапнякова плита
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsLimestone.description: Large slabs of stone laid at random for that temple-like look. Beautiful to look at, they take a lot of work to place down and use up large amounts of resources.
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsSlate.label: сланцева підлога
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsSlate.description: Large slabs of stone laid at random for that temple-like look. Beautiful to look at, they take a lot of work to place down and use up large amounts of resources.
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsMarble.label: мармурова плита
LanguageData.VFEArch_SlabsMarble.description: Large slabs of stone laid at random for that temple-like look. Beautiful to look at, they take a lot of work to place down and use up large amounts of resources.
